title: San Francisco Maritime National Historical Park: Bookstore
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Bookstore            Bookstore         Kingspoke store at the corner of Hyde and Jefferson Streets at the entrance to Hyde Street Pier. NPS  Kingspoke store is located at the corner of Hyde and Jefferson Streets at the entrance to Hyde Street Pier.  Open Daily, 9am - 5pm, 415-742-6165. The store is managed by Western National Parks Association (www.wnpa.org).           Friends of the San Francisco Maritime Museum Library run a used and duplicate book sale located on the third floor of the park's administration building.Book sale location:Fort Mason CenterBuilding E, 3rd FloorSan Francisco, CA  94123415-561-7041Hours of operation: the sale is run by volunteers on weekdays only, so please phone prior to visiting for volunteer staffing availability.
